lantern_ability.hold: Fires a lightning bolt in a direction that deals 200 Shock damage multiple times as it passes through a Behemoth.
Create a fire ball in front of you that explodes after 5 seconds, dealing 750 Blaze damage to all nearby Behemoths.
Create a frost pillar in front of you that deals 940 Frost damage to all nearby Behemoths over 12 seconds.
Disperses aether that allows the Slayer to track the Behemoth.
Creates an aura that grants nearby slayers 15% increased movespeed and attack speed for 15 seconds.

lantern_ability.instant: Grants a 200 hit point shield for 4 seconds.
lantern_ability.hold: Surrounds the slayer in swirling stone that deals 720 damage to all nearby Behemoths over 12 seconds.

Acidic.name: Acidic
Acidic.description: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.

description: Converts 30% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 40% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage

Aetherborne.name: Aetherborne

25% chance not to consume an Aether Vent charge on use
25% chance not to consume an Aether Vent charge on use
25% chance not to consume an Aether Vent charge on use
25% chance not to consume an Aether Vent charge on use

Aetheric Attunement.description: Percent increase to Lantern Charge gained from attacks.

Aetheric Frenzy.name: Aetheric Frenzy
Aetheric Frenzy.description: Gains a flat amount of Lantern Charge on each weapon hit.

Agility.name: Agility
Agility.description: Reduces the stamina cost of dodging.

Assassin's Vigour.name: Assassin's Vigour
Assassin's Vigour.description: Grants Health after breaking a Behemoth part.

1.description: Heal 50 when you break a part

2.description: Heal 100 when you break a part

3.description: Heal 150 when you break a part

4.description: Heal 200 when you break a part

5.description: Heal 250 when you break a part

6.description: Heal 300 when you break a part

Barbed.name: Barbed
Barbed.description: Adds a flat amount of Wound damage on hit.

description: After dodging through an attack the next attack's Expose Damage is increased by 200
After dodging through an attack the next attack's Expose Damage is increased by 200
After dodging through an attack the next attack's Expose Damage is increased by 400

Bladestorm.name: Bladestorm
Bladestorm.description: Adds a flat amount of Part damage on hit.

description: +200 Part Damage after dodging through an attack
+200 Part Damage after dodging through an attack
+400 Part Damage after dodging through an attack

Bloodless.name: Bloodless
Bloodless.description: Protects against Wounded and Crippling Wounds statuses.

description: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 50%
Reduces duration of Wounded status by 80%
Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 50%
Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 80%

Cunning.name: Cunning
Cunning.description: Grants a chance to deal double damage.

Deconstruction.name: Deconstruction
Deconstruction.description: Bonus damage against objects created by Behemoths.

1.description: Deal 110% damage to objects created by Behemoths

2.description: Deal 120% damage to objects created by Behemoths

3.description: Deal 130% damage to objects created by Behemoths

4.description: Deal 150% damage to objects created by Behemoths

5.description: Deal 170% damage to objects created by Behemoths

6.description: Deal 200% damage to objects created by Behemoths

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: Increases the time you are invincible when dodging.

Evasive Fury.name: Evasive Fury
Evasive Fury.description: Temporarily increases attack speed when dodging through a Behemoth's attack.

1.description: +4% Attack Speed for 8 seconds after dodging through an attack

2.description: +8% Attack Speed for 8 seconds after dodging through an attack

3.description: +12% Attack Speed for 8 seconds after dodging through an attack

4.description: +16% Attack Speed for 8 seconds after dodging through an attack

5.description: +20% Attack Speed for 8 seconds after dodging through an attack

6.description: +25% Attack Speed for 16 seconds after dodging through an attack

Fireproof.name: Fireproof
Fireproof.description: Protects against being set on fire.

1.description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 10%

2.description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 20%

3.description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 40%

4.description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 60%

5.description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 80%

6.description: Immune to being set on fire.

Fleet Footed.name: Fleet Footed
Fleet Footed.description: Temporarily increases Movement Speed after a dodge.

1.description: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 10% for 3 seconds

2.description: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 15% for 3 seconds

3.description: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 20% for 3 seconds

4.description: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 25% for 3 seconds

5.description: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 30% for 3 seconds

6.description: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 35% for 3 seconds

Fortress.name: Fortress
Fortress.description: Grants a small shield after avoiding damage for a short time.

1.description: Grants a 10 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

2.description: Grants a 20 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

3.description: Grants a 40 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

4.description: Grants a 60 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

5.description: Grants a 80 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

6.description: Grants a 100 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Insulated.name: Insulated
Insulated.description: Protects against Shocked status effect and allows you to attack electric shields.

description: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 25%
Reduces duration of Shocked status by 50%
Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
Reduces knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields
Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields
Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 100%

Medic.name: Medic
Medic.description: Improves your ability to revive allies.

description: When reviving an ally they are healed an additional 5%
When reviving an ally they are healed an additional 10%
When reviving an ally they are healed an additional 20%
When reviving an ally they are healed an additional 20%
When reviving an ally they are healed an additional 30%
When reviving an ally they are healed an additional 40%
Grants a 300 health shield for 20 seconds after reviving an ally

Merciless.name: Merciless
Merciless.description: Increases Wound damage against staggered Behemoths.

Nimble.name: Nimble
Nimble.description: Restores Stamina when dodging through Behemoth attacks.

1.description: Gain 10 Stamina after dodging through an attack

2.description: Gain 15 Stamina after dodging through an attack

3.description: Gain 20 Stamina after dodging through an attack

4.description: Gain 25 Stamina after dodging through an attack

5.description: Gain 30 Stamina after dodging through an attack

6.description: Gain 35 Stamina after dodging through an attack

Nine Lives.name: Nine Lives
Nine Lives.description: Grants a chance to reduce damage, and later the ability to cheat death.

description: The first time you would be knocked out stay up and heal for 400
The first time you would be knocked out stay up and heal for 400
The first time you would be knocked out stay up and heal for 400 and become empowered for 10 seconds

Pacifier.name: Pacifier
Pacifier.description: Increases stagger damage against enraged Behemoths.

Predator.name: Predator
Predator.description: Increases damage after avoiding damage for a short time.

1.description: Deal 104% damage after not getting hit for 15 seconds. Bonus removed when hit.

2.description: Deal 108% damage after not getting hit for 15 seconds. Bonus removed when hit.

3.description: Deal 114% damage after not getting hit for 15 seconds. Bonus removed when hit.

4.description: Deal 120% damage after not getting hit for 15 seconds. Bonus removed when hit.

5.description: Deal 127% damage after not getting hit for 15 seconds. Bonus removed when hit.

6.description: Deal 135% damage after not getting hit for 15 seconds. Bonus removed when hit.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description: Increases your damage when your health is low.

description: After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 50%
After dodging through an attack the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 100%

2.description: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 20%

3.description: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 40%

4.description: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 60%

6.description: Immune to Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect

4.description: Heal for 125 whenever a Behemoth is Staggered

4.description: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 20%
